text: phir zara gaur to karo phir hamane nooh ke baad aur rasoolon ko apanee qaum ke paas bheja to vah paigambar unake paas vaajee (khule hue) va raushan maujize lekar aae is par bhee jis cheez ko ye log pahale jhuthala chuke the us par eemaan (na laana tha) na lae ham yoonhee had se guzar jaane vaalon ke dilon par (goya) khud mohar kar dete hain
